ygData.subject: A question
ygData.msgSnippet: I posted this in another EQ group as well... As most know already, I havent been playing in awhile...stuff never seems to work out like I want it too and
ygData.messageBody:
I posted this in another EQ group as well...

As most know already, I havent been playing in awhile...stuff never
seems to work out like I want it too and $%^&*(...im sure most of you
feel me on that, lol.

Anyway..i got an email from sony about everquest the otherday and they
said I had 21 days free for me to comeback to EQ ( something like
that) and such. They also said that because of the server mergers, any
toons under 10 that havent been played in 6 months were deleted..:-(

I had 2 toons under 10, one on each account. I had a level 9 rogue who
was my bazaar trader and a level 2 ranger ( who replaced a much higher
ranger that I didnt like). They both had some good stuff on them, esp
the ranger. Im assuming since this stuff was on them or in their
banks, that the stuff is gone. Many hours of hunting and killing and
many many several thousand plat gone and lost. Is there any way I
could get this stuff back when I return or is there a chance the stuff
is there even tho the toons arent ( its been over a year since i last
played regularly, 9 months since i last logged in)

/em is depressed and cries like a schoolboy who got kicked in the
crotch by the mean little girl who had a crush on him.

Greg
